description:
We are looking for a talented Gas Technician 1 to become our instructor at the Ottawa campus. You will work in the lab with G1 students providing practical instruction. There is also an opportunity to provide G1 theory training.
Job Requirements:1. Must have a valid G1 license for at least 5 years.2. Must have a good command of the English language; both written and verbal3. Teaching experience is not required but would be an asset.4. A passion for teaching is definitely welcome!Start Date: As soon as possible!
Job Types: Seasonal, Permanent
Job Types: Seasonal, Permanent
Salary: $45.00-$55.00 per hour
Schedule:

 Monday to Friday
 No weekends

Licence/Certification:

 Gas Technician 1 License for at least 5 years (required)

Work Location: In person
